name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a group of anchors who speak in Northeastern accents and talk about the situation in Russia and Ukraine in front of the camera have attracted the favor and love of many middle-aged and elderly people. Some netizens call it "Northeastern people's own news broadcast - Northeast News Broadcast" and some netizens said "How can I convince my family that this is not the news broadcast"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 28, it was revealed that someone in Yan'an, Shaanxi, was publicly selling degree quotas online, with the highest price for a degree quota reaching 135,000.
It is reported that this is not the first time that Yan'an has exposed a similar incident. In 2022, the primary school affiliated to Yan'an Vocational and Technical College (Yanzhi Affiliated Primary School) was publicly sold online, with a degree quota price as high as 90,000

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Minor students in six schools in a county in Guangxi Province were involved in paid KTV companionship. On August 26, a "reminder letter" with the official seal of the Tiandong County Public Security Bureau of Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region showed that the Tiandong County Public Security Bureau found in its work that some minor students in school were involved in paid companionship in a KTV entertainment venue in the county, and suggested that the Tiandong County Education Bureau organize all primary and secondary schools in the county to strengthen student management in accordance with their duties and guide students to establish a correct outlook on life, morality and values.
The letter mentioned that the schools involved were: Tiandong No. 1 Middle School, No. 2 Middle School, No. 3 Middle School, No. 4 Middle School, Youcheng Middle School and Binjiang Middle School.
Subsequently, the reports on Phoenix and NetEase were deleted.
